browse_lists: Browse through the lists of songs
type_full: Start your search by typing at least 3 characters
type_1_full: Start your search by typing at least 1 character
no_result_full: Try to search for something else or switch research mode
title: Title
no_favourites_full: Here you can have your favourite songs. Add some!
history_empty_full: Here you can find the history of the latest song seen.
history_delete: You're about to delete the history. Do you want to continue?
update_available_full: There's a new update available! You can download it right away
no_songs_full: There are no songs available in this section.
onboarding_welcome: Welcome to He Rose from Death!
onboarding_songs: This app allows you to view the songs of the way wherever you are. If connected to the internet and if available for the song, you can also listen to the recording.
onboarding_search: In addition to viewing the songs, you can easily search for them! You have the ability to search through titles, lyrics, and biblical references.
onboarding_favourites: By swiping the song to the left in the various indexes, you can add it to favorites. There you can gather all the songs you want to keep aside.
help_question_one: How do I add a song to favorites?
help_answer_one: To add a song to favorites, simply swipe the song to the left on the index to reveal the available options, including adding to favorites.
help_question_two: What is Always On Display for?
help_answer_two: Always On Display is a feature that allows the screen to stay awake while you are viewing a song. You can turn it on in settings if you prefer the display to stay awake on the song page.
